title.en: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club

altTitles.ja: 行け！稲中卓球部

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

altTitles.ja: 篠崎くんのメンテ事情

description.en:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

A miserable life where even dreams of love were out of reach. 
The night I tried to end my life from the exhaustion of my joyless marriage, a special invitation arrived unexpectedly.

[ You are an existence that gleams like the jewels.
The Jewel Box, where existences who shine like you gather... 
Would you like to enter the Jewel Box? YES? or NO? ]

[ The Empire's Jewel Box ] is a luxurious party attended by only the most outstanding people. A place where they can meet a marriage partner solely based on "true love" while concealing their face and status.
"If you were granted the opportunity to become a shining Jewel, like those who were specially selected..."

My choice from that night changed everything.

Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

description.en:
I accepted the test results.

[Talentless]

Today, the word “talentless” came to mind. It's my fault, my lack of effort, my lack of talent, or both, or neither. Is it my fault for living like this, or is it society's?

A day passed. I don't know why, but I went back 10 years.

...This is very easy. Is it really true that I had no talent?

altTitles.ja: 皇帝エンディングでいきます

altTitles.th: ทะลุมิติมาลุ้นรัก

description.en: Obsessed with medieval fantasies, Marina develops a revolutionary VR device that can bring fictional worlds to life. Her dreams come true when she transports herself to Lasnorok, the setting of her own novel. The problem is, she can't get back out! Disguised as a runaway slave boy named Rino, she comes face-to-face with the main character she created, the ambitious Edward Allen Dihas. Can Marina help him overthrow the emperor and survive to make it out alive?

title.en: Monster Princess of the Snowy Mountain

altTitles.es-la: La princesa monstruosa de las montañas nevadas

description.en: Valerie Beloff, a princess in exile, decides to take her own life on her 19th birthday. Abused by her own mother and exiled for her mother’s crimes, she had to live in the freezing Makleroad palace by herself, and she somehow acquired the powers of an ancient monster - the power to freeze things. Hopeless, she seeks an escape in death… only to find herself before her cruel mother, yelling at her once again. Is she dead? Is she reliving a memory? When her mother strikes her, the throbbing pain lets her know that this is neither a dream nor a memory!

altTitles.th: องค์หญิงห้องใต้หลังคา

altTitles.ja: 屋根裏部屋の皇女様

description.en:
I've lived in this little hell ever since I was born for being the daughter of a gypsy who carries misfortune. The Trump Empire killed my innocent mother. The emperor, the temple, and the whole empire locked me up, abused me, resented me, and abandon me. Their abandonment is an opportunity, Here in the kingdom of Jardine, I will begin my revenge. The Trump Empire, may it dry up a little more. The dryness will soon be a precious stream for me. …I will start my revenge.

---
Branded as a cursed child, Princess Osiria spent most of her life locked in an attic. In actuality, Osiria is the divinely chosen, the one who could’ve saved the empire of Trionfo. Instead, she was sold to a neighboring kingdom and left in the care of Sir Fedelius, a handsome young knight. Although her heart beats faster when Fedelius is around, she doesn’t plan on staying for long. She wants only one thing… to get revenge on those who abused her and killed her mother. Will her heart soften with love or will she seek vengeance to the very end?

---

description.fr:
Pendant 20 longues années, l'Empire a connu une immense sécheresse. La coupable? Une de ses propres princesses. Surnommée la «Princesse du grenier,» elle serait celle responsable de ce malheur. Pour la punir, elle a donc été enfermée dans un grenier et a été traitée pire qu'un chien pendant 20 ans. Enfin, pour pouvoir importer de l'eau, l'Empire décide d'offrir la princesse au royaume voisin. Pour survivre, la princesse accepte son sort et prétend être une idiote. Mais la réalité est tout autre et la princesse pourrait être bien plus spéciale que ce qu'il paraît.

自從我出生以來，我就一直生活在這個小地獄裡，在一個單獨的、黑暗而狹窄的閣樓裡。

因為我是一個惹禍的吉普賽人的女兒。

特朗普帝國殺死了我無辜的母親。

帝王神殿，全帝國囚禁我，虐待我，怨恨我，拋棄我。

他們的遺棄是一個機會，在扎爾丁王國，我將開始復仇。

altTitles.ja: 異世界薬局

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

title.en: The S-Class Baby Princess Is So Strong

altTitles.en: The S-Class Little Princess Is Too Strong

altTitles.es-la: La Princesa Bebé Clase S Es Muy Fuerte

description.en:
I was an S-class hunter, but I reincarnated as a princess?
***
‘I did it, I killed the demon!’
However, the world was not saved. It was still in chaos, and I was already on the verge of dying.
‘Am I going to die like this…?’
My eyes were getting blurry.
But then,
‘A reward at this time? You damn system!’
[The reward is…]
‘What?’
What came out of my mouth when I tried to scream was a babble instead.
“Eubu.”
[Consciousness has successfully been loaded!] [You have been reincarnated! Congratulations!]
“Agatata!” (Reincarnation, great!)
However, I wasn’t alone this time, because I had a family now.
‘My father and brothers, why are they so strange?’
“I have separation anxiety.”
“I don’t need anything but Risha!”
Also, the enemy of my past life suddenly appeared.
“My savior and benefactor, Princess Anatrisha.”
I only saved him. Why was he like this?
‘Will I be able to be happy this time?’

description.de:
Plötzlich wurde ich als Arielle Winston wiedergeboren - eine begnadete Parfümeurin, die als Einzige das Parfüm herstellen kann, das als Heilmittel gegen den Wahnsinn des Herzogs Cedric Evans dient. Doch dem Herzog steht ein tragisches Schicksal bevor und somit gilt es, mich auf das zu konzentrieren, was ich am besten kann: Parfüme herstellen!

---

description.en:
A young woman sick with an incurable illness closes her eyes for the last time, only to wake up as Ariel Winston, an antagonist of the novel she had loved reading before her death. Knowing that death lies before her if she continues down the path the real Ariel has been going towards, she quickly breaks up with Duke Cedric Evans, who is not only the protagonist of the novel but a man who is cursed with a condition that causes him to become bloodthirsty when he does not smell a specific scent constantly. However, Cedric, who had been forced to date Ariel due to her status as his personal perfumer, suddenly seems reluctant to distance himself from her. Just what is wrong with this man, and how will this change the events of the novel? Will Ariel be able to live the life she wants?

---

description.fr:
Que feriez-vous si vous vous réincarniez dans la peau d’Ariel Winston, une parfumeuse de génie qui est la seule à pouvoir créer le parfum qui sert de traitement contre la folie du Duc mais dont le destin tragique est d’être exécutée? Pour notre héroïne qui souffrait d’anosmie, la réponse est simple. S’éloigner du Duc qui la mène à ce destin tragique et se concentrer sur ce qu’elle fait de mieux: créer des parfums!

---

description.ko:
후각을 비롯한 모든 감각을 상실하는 불치병에 걸린 주인공. 그녀는 죽은 뒤 천재 조향사 '아리엘 윈스턴'에 빙의된다.
그러나 '아리엘'은 소설 속에서 남주 '세드릭'에게 집착하다 목숨을 잃는 엑스트라 악녀. 주인공은 목숨을 잃지 않기 위해 남주와의 관계를 끊기로 결심한다.
천재 조향사 '아리엘'로서 살아가게 된 주인공은 이전 생에서 자신의 꿈이 조향사였다는 것을 떠올리고 본격적으로 향수 사업을 시작한다.
그런데, 갑자기 '세드릭'이 '아리엘'에게 관심을 보이는데….

"공작님. 저희 이런 사이 아니었잖아요?"

description.en:
Lee Yoonsung and Park Dokyung grew up together in the countryside since they were young. Yoonsung became an actor by chance, but whenever he has time, he travels back and forth between Seoul and his hometown to see Dokyung, his first and unrequited love.

Dokyung cared for Yoonsung, who had cried a lot since he was young.
Yoonsung finds himself developing stronger feelings for Dokyung, and his body's responses are becoming more noticeable.
Fearing that his feelings would be exposed, Yoonsung tries not to show and resolves to remain at least a friend... -Madeleine Scans-

altTitles.ja: 公爵家の99番目の花嫁

description.en:
Grace lost her mother and became an orphan, she lived on the streets and was waiting for the day of her death, but she was taken in by an angelic girl, Penelope Erdonia. One day, a marriage proposal came for Penelope from the Duke of Pelton, who was none other than the head of the most powerful family at the time. However, there is a rumour that all the women who went to the Pelton estate to marry him either disappear or return with a strange mind. In order to protect the innocent Penelope, Grace decides to marry the Duke instead.

---
When the daughter of the Erdona barony is forced to marry the infamous Duke Noel Felton, her loyal servant Grace McClean saves the day… by posing as the duke’s 99th bride-to-be! She’s doing her best to impress her fiancé by making him treats, rescuing a child, and even befriending the imperial princess! All seems well, until one day, Grace stumbles upon the duke’s journal and learns about his master plan... Will Grace survive her marriage? And what does the duke have in store for the empire?

---

description.it:
Grace ha perso la madre ed è rimasta orfana, viveva per strada e passava il tempo in attesa che arrivasse la sua morte, ma un giorno venne aiutata e accolta da una ragazza, Penelope Erdonia. In seguito, arrivò una proposta di matrimonio per Penelope da parte del duca di Felton, ossia il capo della famiglia più potente dell'epoca. Tuttavia, si dice che tutte le donne che sono andate alla tenuta di Felton per sposarlo scompaiano o ne escano completamente pazze. Per proteggere l'innocente Penelope, Grace decide di sposare il Duca al suo posto...

description.ko:
어머니를 잃고 천애 고아가 된 그레이스.
죽을 날만 기다리며 길에서 생활하던 그레이스는
천사 같은 아가씨 페네로피 에르도냐에게 거둬진 후
그레이스 에르도냐가 되었다.

생명의 은인인 그녀와 의자매처럼 없이 지내던 어느 날,
페네로피에게 혼담이 들어온다.

다름 아닌 현시점 최고의 권력을 자랑하는 가문인 '펠튼 공작가'

그곳에 시집간 여자들은 모두 실종되거나
정신이 이상하게 변해 돌아온다는 괴담이 있다.

페네로피를 지키기 위해 그녀 대신 공작에게 시집갈 계획을 세우는 그레이스.

'제가 처음은 아니라고 들었는데 혹시 몇 번째인지 알 수 있을까요?'

'어디 보자... 아가씨가 99번째입니다.'

그레이스 에르도냐, 정신 바짝 차리자!

altTitles.ja: 子連れ狼

description.en: In the feudal era of Japan, Ogami Itto is the elite executioner for the Shogun until the ruthless Yagyu clan frames him in an attempt to gain the position. His name dishonored and his wife murdered, Itto and his infant son Daigoro wander Japan as an assassin for hire, named Lone Wolf and Cub. Ultimately, Ogami Itto strives for revenge against the Yagyu clan.

altTitles.ja: この裏アカ、先生でしょ？

description.en:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.

altTitles.ja: はやくしたいふたり

description.en:
Yuuri and Keiichirou fell in love as they shared the same route to neighboring high schools every day. But it turns out Keiichirou comes from a prestigious family where his father and grandfather were both prime ministers. The family rules strictly forbids him from having any inappropriate relations with a woman until he turns 18. Can he resist Yuuri's flirting?  


---
description.vi:
Hasegawa Yuuri, một học sinh cao trung bình thường luôn có ước mơ được “chim chuột” với người yêu. Cô đang hẹn hò với Katsuragi Keiichirou – tương lai sẽ trở thành người đứng đầu đất nước?! Và đặc biệt, trong gia đình của Keiichirou lại có truyền thống kì lạ về chuyện “ấy”? Làm thế nào Yuuri có thể chấp nhận được chuyện này?? Hãy cùng đón xem câu chuyện siêu đáng yêu của cặp đôi chênh lệnh nhất mọi thời đại này nào!!  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/aki_kusaka)

altTitles.ja: 眠れないメイドの夜

altTitles.en: The Sleepless Night of the Maid

altTitles.es-la: La noche de insomnio de la doncella

description.en:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintance’s house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that he’s her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Eva’s heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: KIG⊃R∩MI
KIG⊃R∩MI―キグルミ―

description.en: The story focuses around Makoto, a student who talent is making stuffed toys. He starts researching the mysterious disease going around called 'Sudden Death Syndrome' after finding out that his latest creation looks like the mysterious stuffed rabbit rumored to be causing it.

description.fr: Yonggi a en réalité peur des femmes ?! Yonggi, beau et populaire comme jamais, semble avoir tout. Mais l'apparence peut décevoir, et il joue définitivement la carte de l'escroquerie à long terme. Il n'est pas le Casanova que tout le monde pense ! Un jour, son ancienne camarade de classe, Suyeon, arrive sur son lieu de travail. Sera-t-elle celle qui apaisera enfin son cœur inquiet ?

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: My Home As a Filming Location!

description.en:
After returning from walking around my neighborhood, I was met with an entire film crew in my front yard?!
Yeonwoo, a beekeeper who lived in a secluded village, signed a contract that stated that his house would be used for filming with a PD who directed <Countryside Occupations> while he was drunk.
Later on, he found out that he would be filming his life with Kang Dojoon, a famous Korean actor.
Begrudgingly, he started to prepare for filming.
Contrary to what he thought before, he changed his mind after seeing Kang Dojoon in person.

*If I have to live with a handsome guy like that for 10 days... that wouldn't be so bad.*

Will Dojoon successfully complete filming for <Countryside Occupations>?

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間

altTitles.zh: 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间

altTitles.ja: 姫様“拷問”の時間です

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
description.id:
Seorang Putri yang ditahan oleh pasukan Raja Iblis, disiapkan untuk menerima siksaan dari Raja Iblis tanpa henti!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Chapter 1 art](https://i.imgur.com/SaOoznH.png)

description.en:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

Lee Saehyun fell into a deeply depressed state after losing his parents when he was still a child. Coincidentally, he meets a mysterious little boy named Yoonwo, who brings him peace of mind.

For years straight, the little boy would visit Saehyun's house once every week, which helped Saehyun pass time peacefully and comfortably.
However, suddenly after Saehyun began to meet other girls or go on dates, it would always rain, and there was no process in his romantic relationships.

But are these constant unfortunate and coincidental scenarios simply just coincidental? Or is this the work of someone up in the sky?

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

altTitles.ja: ブラザー・トラップ

description.en:
The boy I fell in love with… is my ex-boyfriend's younger brother. 

Akari met Izumi, a younger man of few words, at a college party. Akari hasn't been able to get over her ex-boyfriend and find a new love, but she and Izumi gradually became friends... Things seemed to be going well for the two of them, until...! A heart-pounding love-triangle romance!

altTitles.ja: 提督の怪物妻

description.ar:
تسمى ليديا بلانانج بالوحش بسبب حراشفها.
 عوملت كقاصر وأجبرت على الزواج بأمر من الإمبراطور. خطيبها بحار متوحش وشرس.
 إنه أميرال تشيليا الذي يشاع أنه سادي للغاية.
 لكن عندما التقى بها لأول مرة ، كان لطيفًا معها بشكل لا يصدق ...؟
 "أمسك زوجي بيد زوجته وكان يصرخ بالفعل".
 تتعلم ليديا شيئًا فشيئًا عن سر تشيليا في حب الأدميرال الشديد.
 التنانين والأخطبوطات العملاقة وثعابين البحر والجنيات وحوريات البحر ...
 حب مقدّر بعد الزواج على المحيط الرائع!
 **
 "أعرف نبتة يمكن أن تساعد زوجي على زيادة قدرته على التحمل."
 انحنى الإسكندر وهمس في أذنها.
 "إذا لم تكن راضيًا الليلة الماضية ، فسأحاول العثور عليها."
 "... أوه لا!"
 ليلة أمس!
 احمر خجل ليديا حرفيا لأنها تتذكر أسرارها التي لا يمكنها إخبار أي شخص.
description.en:
Lydia Planang is called a monster because of her scales. She was treated like a minor and forced to marry by the order of the emperor. Her fiancé is a wild and fierce sailor. He is the admiral of Chillia, who is rumored to be very sadistic. But when he first met her, he was incredibly nice to her…?

"My husband just grabbed his wife's hand and he was already screaming."

Lydia learns little by little about Chillia's secret in the admiral's intense love. Dragons, giant octopuses, sea snakes, fairies and mermaids… A destined love after marriage on the splendid ocean!

**

"I know a plant that can help my husband increase his stamina."

Alexander leaned over and whispered in her ear, "If you weren't satisfied last night, I'll try to find it."

"…Oh no!" Last night! Lydia literally blushed as she recalled her secrets that she couldn’t tell anyone.

---
They call her a monster... but to this admiral, she's a sacred descendant of the sea! Rudia Flang has been mistreated her whole life, so when the emperor arranges her marriage to Alexander Cilia, war hero and the youngest admiral in history, she cowers in fear at the thought of marrying a violent seaman. As this ocean voyage treks on, she's met with benevolence from the Sercilian Island people who, unbeknownst to her, find the scales glistening on her body far from the marking of a monster...

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58318624)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-admirals-monstrous-wife/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97119)
description.fr:
Lydia Plang a été appelée un monstre à cause de ses écailles. Elle a été traitée comme une sous-humaine et a été forcée de se marier par ordre de l'empereur. Son fiancé est un marin tropical sauvage et féroce. C'est un amiral de Chilia, dont on dit qu'il est atroce.

Mais il la rencontre pour la première fois et se montre étonnamment gentil avec elle...?

"Le mari a juste tenu la main de sa femme et cela l'a fait crier."

Lydia apprend peu à peu le secret de Chilia dans l'amour intense de l'amiral.

Dragons, krakens, serpents de mer, nymphes et sirènes, amour fatidique après le pré-mariage dans la belle mer! Un fantasme de romance marine unique qui n'a jamais été vu auparavant par un artiste calligraphe.

**

"Je connais une plante qui aide à l'endurance de mon mari."

Puis Alexandre se pencha et lui chuchota à l'oreille.

"Si vous n'avez pas aimé hier soir, je vais le trouver et l'essayer."
"…Oh non!"

La nuit dernière! Des choses trop secrètes pour être racontées à qui que ce soit venaient à l'esprit, et Lydia rougit.
description.ko:
태어날 때부터 몸 곳곳에 비늘이 돋아 괴물이라 불리던 플랑 후작 가문의 영애 '루디아 플랑'.

그녀는 황제의 명으로 거칠고 사납기로 유명한 뱃사람, 칠리아 제독과 결혼하게 된다.

그런데 처음 만난 그는 의외로 상냥하기만 한데...?

환상적인 바다에서 펼쳐지는 선결혼 후연애 운명적 사랑!
description.ru: Лидию Плананг называли чудовищем из-за ее чешуи. С ней обращались как с недочеловеком, и по приказу императора она была вынуждена выйти замуж. Ее жених - дикий и свирепый тропический моряк. Он адмирал Килии и по слухам просто ужасен. Однако, при первой же встрече он неожиданно оказывается к ней добр…?
description.tr: Lydia Planang, pulları nedeniyle canavar olarak adlandırıldı. Alt insan muamelesi gördü ve imparatorun emriyle evlenmeye zorlandı. Nişanlısı vahşi ve vahşi bir tropikal denizcidir. Acımasız olduğu söylenen Chilia'nın bir amirali. Ancak, onunla ilk kez karşılaştığında ve beklenmedik bir şekilde ona karşı nazik davrandığında? Evlilik öncesi, Evlilik sonrası ve güzel denizde ortaya çıkan kader aşkı.

title.en: Kao ni denai Kashiwada-san to Kao ni deru Ota-kun

altTitles.ja: 顔に出ない柏田さんと顔に出る太田君

altTitles.ko: 얼굴에 드러나지 않는 카시와다 양과 얼굴에 드러나는 오오타 군

altTitles.pt-br: A inexpressiva Kashiwada-san e o emotivo Oota-kun

description.en:
Meet Kashiwada-san, a female middle-school student, who remains emotionless regardless of how she is meddled with.  
And Oota-kun, unable to control his facial expressions, is the complete opposite of Kashiwada-san–but he keeps messing with her, against his better judgment?!  
Though the two of them are the exact opposite, will a mutual love eventually develop between them…?  
 

---

**Links:**  
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/zktldhkek)
description.pt: Conheça Kashiwada-san, uma estudante do ensino médio, que permanece sem expressões, independentemente do que ela está sentindo. E Oota-kun, incapaz de controlar suas expressões faciais, é o completo oposto de Kashiwada-san, mas ele continua mexendo com ela, será que ele vai chegar a algum lugar? Embora ambos sejam exatamente o oposto, um amor mútuo acabará se desenvolvendo entre eles …?
description.pt-br: Conheça Kashiwada-san, uma estudante do ensino médio, que permanece sem expressões, independentemente do que ela está sentindo. description.en: Unrequited love x Yuri x Mild SM.

altTitles.ja: ネガくんとポジちゃん

description.en: Nega Shouya and Hoshi Sayaka are high school classmates. Nega is tremendously pessimistic, while Hoshi is optimistic, both to a fault. They also happen to be deeply in love with each other, but they completely misread each other's cues, him erring by defect, and her erring by excess. The fundamental law of magnetism states that opposites attract, and these two starkly different young lovers are not the exception!
description.es:
Nega Shouya y Hoshi Sayaka son compañeros de secundaria. Nega es tremendamente pesimista, mientras Hoshi es optimista, ambos a tal punto de que se vuelven falencias. También sucede que están profundamente enamorados el uno del otro, pero ambos interpretan mal las señales que se envían el uno al otro, él errando por defecto y ella errando por exceso. La ley fundamental del magnetismo dicta que los opuestos se atraen, ¡y estos dos amantes tan diferentes el uno del otro no son la excepción!  


---
description.fr:
Nega Shouya et Hoshi Sayaka sont camarades de classe.   
Nega est terriblement pessimiste, alors que Hoshi est une fille optimiste, à tel point que ça en devient pénible pour les deux.  
Ils s'aiment l'un l'autre mais interprètent mal les signaux qu'ils s'envoient. Lui, manquant de confiance, et elle, excessivement sûre d'elle. La loi fondamentale du magnétisme dicte que les opposés s'attirent et… ces deux amants si différents l'un de l'autre ne font pas exception à la règle !

description.en:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
description.es: Ella tuvo que pasar por la aniquilación de su familia, él llegó al final de su vida para darle la oportunidad de vengarse. “Aiana.” El caballero que estuvo a mi lado durante 13 años, arriesgó su vida, sufrió, pasó hambre y lo dio todo por mí. Pero ahora, al presentarse mi muerte inminente, sonreía felizmente mientras contemplaba mi desceso. “Por favor, ten una historia agradable esta vez, mi señora”. El demonio sonrió y me tendió la mano. “Espero que en la próxima historia obtengas el final que deseas”

description.en:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
description.hu: Hestia, a főhősnőnk a kedvenc regényének egy gazdag mellékszereplőjeként ébred egy nap. Rajongóként legelső dolga, hogy nemesi címet vásároljon magának annak érdekében, hogy az imádott drágaságát, a regény second male lead-jét, Caelust láthassa az arisztokrata bálokon. Hestia úgy dönt, csak külső szemlélő lesz, nem avatkozik bele a cselekményszálba. A regény eredeti befejezését követő évben azonban olyan váratlan dolog történik Caelus-szal, ami Hestiát mégis cselekvésre készteti, hogy a bias-a elkerülhesse a tragikus befejezést.1
description.ko:
"내 최애를 살려내!"
N회차 정주행할 만큼 애정하던 로판 소설에 빙의한 헤스티아,
엑스트라 of 엑스트라에 빙의한 덕에 주인공들을 직관하고 드디어 맞이한 작품의 엔딩!
엔딩 후 현실로 돌아가게 될 거란 예상은 산산조각이 나고,
소설의 엔딩 후 비하인드가 가장 애정하는 캐릭터였던 서브남 카엘루스의 죽음이라는 충격에서 벗어나기도 전에
소설의 엔딩 직후로 회귀하는데…!
그렇다면 이번엔, 내 최애를 지켜내겠어!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

title.en: The Best Luck of My Life

altTitles.es-la: La mejor suerte de mi vida

description.en:
“If you don’t love me, I’ll jump.”

Hwibeom, who is cursed with bad luck, is partnered with Yeonwoo for a group project. Despite Yeonwoo’s gloomy appearance, the project is flawless. Hwibeom starts putting in extra effort to take care of Yeonwoo for his own grade’s benefit. Whenever Hwibeom is with Yeonwoo, he can’t help but feel that his luck is improving… Until Yeonwoo threatens to jump off of a building.

Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽

description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

description.en: Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

description.ar:
تم إعدام Eloise Wayana ، دوقة الشمال الكبرى ، من قبل الإمبراطور Caien Helisis بعد أن تم الكشف عن أنها كانت سراً شريرة طوال الوقت. يمثل هذا نهاية الموسم الثاني من أحدث روايات الويب الشائعة ، “The Crown of Blood”. كواحدة من قرائها النهمين ، تنتظر Kim Dakyung بفارغ الصبر الموسم المقبل عندما تصدمها شاحنة فجأة في طريقها إلى المنزل! ولكن بمجرد استيقاظها ، وجدت نفسها في جسد الدوقة الكبرى وتم نقلها عن بعد إلى بداية الرواية. تعرف داكيونغ بالفعل على الطريق الذي ستسير فيه Eloise ، وتسعى جاهدة لتغيير مصيرها والبقاء على قيد الحياة حتى الموسم الثالث. من حسن حظها أن نسخة أصغر من Caien تقع في يديها ، وستفعل كل ما يلزم لإبقائه إلى جانبها.

description.de:
Eloise Wayana, die Großherzogin des Nordens, wird von Kaiser Caien Helisis hingerichtet, nachdem bekannt wurde, dass sie all die Zeit über insgeheim eine Schurkin war. So endet die zweite Season des beliebten Online-Romans *Die Krone aus Blut*. Als eine begeisterte Leserin wartet Kim Dakyung sehnsüchtig auf die nächste Season, als sie auf ihrem Heimweg plötzlich von einem LKW angefahren wird! Doch als sie wieder aufwacht, stellt sie fest, dass sie sich selbst im Körper der Großherzogin befindet und an den Anfang des Romans teleportiert wurde. Dakyung, die bereits weiß, welchen Weg Eloise einschlagen wird, ist fest entschlossen, ihr Schicksal zu ändern und will bis zur dritten Season überleben. Zu ihrem Glück gelangt eine jüngere Version von Kaiser Caien in ihre Obhut, und sie wird alles tun, damit er auf ihrer Seite bleibt.

description.en:
Eloise Wayana, the grand duchess of the North, is executed by Emperor Caien Helisis after it is revealed that she was secretly a villainess all along. This marks the end of season two of the latest trending web novel, *The Crown of Blood*. As one of its avid readers, Kim Dakyung is eagerly waiting for the next season when she is suddenly hit by a truck on her way home! But once she reawakens, she finds that she is in the body of the grand duchess herself and has been teleported back to the novel’s beginning. Already knowing what road Eloise will go down, Dakyung is desperate to change her fate and survive until season three. Lucky for her, a younger version of Caien falls right into her hands, and she is going to do whatever it takes to keep him on her side.

---

description.es:
Eloise Wayana, la gran duquesa del Norte, es ejecutada por el emperador Caien Helisis tras revelarse que siempre fue una villana en secreto. Esto marca el final de la segunda temporada de la última novela web de tendencia, *The Crown of Blood*. Como una de sus ávidas lectoras, Kim Dakyung está esperando ansiosamente la siguiente temporada cuando de repente es atropellada por un camión de camino a casa. Pero una vez que despierta, descubre que está en el cuerpo de la propia gran duquesa y que ha sido teletransportada al principio de la novela. Sabiendo ya el camino que seguirá Eloise, Dakyung está desesperada por cambiar su destino y sobrevivir hasta la tercera temporada. Por suerte para ella, una versión más joven de Caien cae justo en sus manos, y va a hacer lo que sea necesario para mantenerlo de su lado.

description.fr:
Après s’être révélée comme étant la méchante cachée de l’histoire, Eloise Wayana, la grande-duchesse du nord, se voit exécutée par l’empereur Caien Helisis. Cet évènement marque la fin de la saison deux du dernier roman en vogue publié sur internet: *La couronne de sang*. Kim Dakyung, l’une de ses ferventes lectrices, attend avec impatience la prochaine saison lorsqu’elle est soudainement heurtée par un camion en rentrant chez elle! Mais lorsqu’elle se réveille, elle découvre qu’elle est dans le corps de la grande-duchesse elle-même et qu’elle a été téléportée au début du roman. Sachant déjà quel chemin Eloise va emprunter, Dakyung est prête à tout pour changer son destin et survivre jusqu’à la saison trois. Heureusement pour elle, une version plus jeune de Caien se retrouve entre ses mains, et elle va tout faire pour le garder à ses côtés.

description.id:
Kim Dakyung seumur hidupnya tidak pernah melakukan apa pun yang dia suka dan hidup mengikuti semua keinginan orang tuanya. Satu-satunya hal yang diperintahkan orang tuanya dan dia sukai adalah kendo dan membaca novel untuk mengisi waktunya. Tapi naas, saat sedang membaca novel kesukaannya, dia mati dan tiba-tiba masuk ke dalam novel itu. Terlebih dia menjadi tokoh yang akan mati di akhir season 2. Agar tidak mati lagi, dia berusaha keras untuk mengubah kehidupannya di dalam novel!

---
Eloise Wayana, duchess agung dari Utara, dieksekusi oleh Kaisar Caien Helisis setelah terungkap bahwa dia diam-diam adalah penjahat selama ini. Ini menandai akhir musim kedua dari novel web trending terbaru, "The Crown of Blood." Sebagai salah satu pembaca setianya, Kim Dakyung sangat menantikan musim berikutnya ketika dia tiba-tiba ditabrak truk dalam perjalanan pulang! Tapi begitu dia bangun kembali, dia menemukan bahwa dia berada di dalam tubuh Grand Duchess sendiri dan telah diteleportasi kembali ke awal novel. Sudah mengetahui jalan apa yang Eloise akan lalui, Dakyung putus asa untuk mengubah nasibnya dan bertahan hingga musim ketiga. Beruntung baginya, versi Caien yang lebih muda jatuh tepat ke tangannya, dan dia akan melakukan apa pun untuk membuatnya tetap di sisinyaEloise Wayana, duchess agung dari Utara, dieksekusi oleh Kaisar Caien Helisis setelah terungkap bahwa dia diam-diam adalah penjahat selama ini. Sudah mengetahui jalan apa yang Eloise akan lalui, Dakyung putus asa untuk mengubah nasibnya dan bertahan hingga musim ketiga. Beruntung baginya, versi Caien yang lebih muda jatuh tepat ke tangannya, dan dia akan melakukan apa pun untuk membuatnya tetap di sisinya.

description.pt:
Eloise Wayana, a grã-duquesa do Norte, é executada pelo imperador Caien Helisis depois que é revelado que ela era secretamente uma vilã o tempo todo. Isso marca o final da segunda temporada do mais recente romance da web, *The Crown of Blood*. Como uma de suas ávidas leitoras, Kim Dakyung está esperando ansiosamente pela próxima temporada, quando de repente é atropelada por um caminhão a caminho de casa! Mas uma vez que ela desperta, ela descobre que está no corpo da grã-duquesa e foi teletransportada de volta ao início do romance. Já sabendo qual caminho Eloise seguirá, Dakyung está desesperada para mudar seu destino e sobreviver até a terceira temporada. Para sua sorte, uma versão mais jovem de Caien cai em suas mãos, e ela fará o que for preciso para mantê-lo ao seu lado.

คิมดาคยอง แฟนนิยายเรื่อง ‘มงกุฎอาบโลหิต’ ประสบอุบัติเหตุจนทำให้เข้ามาอยู่ในร่างของ เอโลอีส เวย์อานา แกรนด์ดัชเชสแห่งแดนเหนือ ตัวละครจากเว็บโนเวลชื่อดังที่เธอกำลังรอภาคต่ออย่างใจจดใจจ่อ ผู้ที่ดาคยองรู้เป็นอย่างดีว่าจะถูกจักรพรรดิไคเอนประหาร หลังโดนเปิดโปงว่าเป็นจอมวายร้าย ในตอนจบของภาคที่ 2 ดาคยองที่ตกเป็นตัวร้ายจำเป็น จึงพยายามเปลี่ยนชะตากรรมของเอโลอีส และตั้งเป้าหมายว่าจะต้องอยู่รอดไปจนถึงภาคที่ 3 โชคดีของเธอที่สามารถกำไคเอนในวัยละอ่อนไว้ในมือ คราวนี้เธอจะทำทุกวิถีทางเพื่อให้เขามาอยู่ข้างเดียวกับเธอให้ได้!

description.tr:
Kuzey’in büyük düşesi Eloise Wayana, başından beri gizlice kötülük yapan bir kadın olduğunun ortaya çıkmasından sonra, İmparator Chien Hemoliz tarafından idam edilir. Bu olay, en poüle romanlardan olan “The Crown Of Blood’un ikinci sezonunun sonuydu. Romanın hevesli okuyucularından biri olan Kim Dakyung, gelecek sezonu sabırsızlıkla beklerken aniden bir kamyon kendisine çarpar. Ancak daha sonra uyandığında, kendisini büyük düşesin bedeninde bulur ve romanın başlangıcının olduğu yere ışınlandığını farkeder. Eloise’ın hangi yoldan gittiğini ve başına neler geldiğini bilen Dakyung, kaderini değiştirmek ve üçüncü sezona kadar hayatta kalabilmek için çaresizce bir hayatta kalma savaşına girişir.

description.zh-hk:
因為一場車禍意外，多景醒來後竟然穿越進入自己正在追更的人氣小說裡面! 雖然很不知所措，但卻在小說的世界裡感受到了從未體會過的「自由」!可是怎麼偏偏是剛剛被寫死的角色…多景要如何在小說裡面的世界繼續活下去呢?

---
很難辦，偏偏附身成為了在頹廢小說中背後捅刀男主，最後遭受各種拷問後死去的最終黑幕惡女。

擁有滔天的權力和金錢，有必要去招惹男主嗎?悄悄地不要出現在男主面前，在北部為養老做準備吧。

“把北部的門鎖上。”“未經我的允許，誰都不准進來。”為了不跟男主糾纏到一起，甚至鎖上了城門…“閣下，你看起來還是個孩子，怎麼能一個人進入邊境森林呢?”

原作中簡單描寫的“消失的幾年”裡，男主角偏偏身在北部這片黑幕領地?“你是誰…?”“殿下?你現在是讓我叫你殿下嗎?”男主自己來到了北部。而且還失去了記憶。

---

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語
メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

Is my cursed husband's fate up to me?
Madelyn's husband Ian was left broken after the war, and in turn, made her life a living hell. Fleeing her doomed marriage, she meets a tragic end. But when she opens her eyes, she finds herself at 17 again. The war has yet to start, and Madelyn can still change her fate. But what about Ian?
description.pt-br:
O destino do meu maldito marido depende de mim?
O marido de Madelyn, Ian, ficou destroçado depois da guerra e, por sua vez, tornou a vida dela um inferno. Fugindo de seu casamento condenado, ela encontra um fim trágico. Mas quando ela abre os olhos, ela se vê novamente com 17 anos. A guerra ainda não começou e Madelyn ainda pode mudar o seu destino. Mas e Ian?

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

title.en: Chiisana Kimi to, Koe wo Tooku ni

altTitles.ja: ちいさな君と、こえを遠くに

description.en:
Manga adaptation of the "10th place Next Light Novel Award 2023!(Paperback category)" winner novel with the same name, written by Tsukasa author of "Unlimited Fafnir" illustrated by Shiratama.

Sota former vocalist of a popular band, having lost his former voice, he moves to a new high school where there is no one he knows to try to live quietly as Kanata Fujinami.
However, when he meets Sora, an elementary school girl who wants to become a voice actor, Kanata's dormant heart is moved and the story of Sora's journey toward her dream begins.
description.ja:
次にくるライトノベル大賞2023 10位入賞！（文庫部門）
『銃皇無尽のファフニール』ツカサ氏と大人気イラストレーターしらたま氏初のライトノベルをコミカライズ！

大人気バンドのボーカルをしていたソウタは、
当時の声を失ったことで、誰も知らない転校先の高校で本名の藤波奏太（ふじなみかなた）としてひっそり暮らそうとしていた。
だが、声優になりたい女子小学生・空（そら）と出会ったことで、奏太の心の変化と、空の夢へ向かう物語が始まる――。
